    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_0837cccae7a760d4618705f8ca52d7644edf980d</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_0837cccae7a760d4618705f8ca52d7644edf980d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field of a current-carrying wire: downward current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie von einer 
aktuell-tragenden Leitung auf: abwärts Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ magnétique d'un fil actuel-portant : 
courant de haut en bas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo magnético de um fio atual-carregando: 
corrente descendente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campo magnetico di un legare 
corrente-trasportante: corrente in discesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητικό πεδίο ενός παρών-φέρνοντας καλωδίου: 
προς τα κάτω ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo magnético de un alambre actual-que lleva: 
corriente hacia abajo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three diagrams on observing magnetic fields of a straight wire. This diagram shows four compasses pointing at a clockwise direction around a wire that carries a downward current.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current-carrying wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct current voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Diagrammen auf dem Beobachten 
magnetisch fängt von einer geraden Leitung auf. Dieses
Diagramm zeigt vier Kompassse, die auf eine rechtse herum Richtung um 
eine Leitung zeigen, die einen abwärts Strom trägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois diagrammes sur observer les champs
magnétiques d'un fil droit. Ce diagramme montre quatre 
boussoles se dirigeant à un sens horaire autour d'un fil qui porte un
courant de haut en bas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três diagramas em observar campos 
magnéticos de um fio reto. Este diagrama mostra quatro 
compassos que apontam em um sentido sentido horário em torno de um 
fio que carregue uma corrente descendente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre schemi sull'osservazione dei 
campi magnetici di un legare diritto. Questo schema mostra 
quattro bussole che indicano ad un senso orario intorno ad un legare 
che trasporta una corrente in discesa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών διαγραμμάτων στην παρατήρηση των 
μαγνητικών πεδίων ενός ευθέος καλωδίου. Αυτό το διάγραμμα
εμφανίζει τέσσερις πυξίδες που δείχνουν σε μια δεξιόστροφη 
κατεύθυνση γύρω από ένα καλώδιο που φέρνει ένα προς τα κάτω 
ρεύμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres diagramas en la observación de 
campos magnéticos de un alambre recto. Este diagrama muestra 
cuatro compases que señalan en una dirección a la derecha alrededor 
de un alambre que lleve una corriente hacia abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell-tragende Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstrom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstromspannung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schalten Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fil actuel-portant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tension de courant continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interruptor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legare corrente-trasportante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente continua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tensione della corrente continua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interruttore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διακόπτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">alambre actual-que lleva</string>
